txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Orcs often come at night, marching through the farms and coming right up to the edge of town before we even know that they are out there. It has become a large problem, and we have lost many from surprise attacks.\n\n'We need pitch. With it, we can coat our arrows and set them ablaze, lighting the night sky and revealing our enemies. Sâd Torech, a former town of Gondor, has many vases filled with pitch. Bring some back for us.'
'Very good. We are not making many boats these days, but the Orcs do not like when our arrows burn.'
'Let me know when you are ready to venture to Sâd Torech.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Pitch is used to waterproof boats and coat arrows so they will burn.
Vases can be found in Sâd Torech.\n\nAldbéort has asked you to collect pitch-filled vases from Sâd Torech.
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to receive the pitch-filled vases.
